WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is a known issue, it's fixed for 2.2.6.
WorkItem.Description:
I receive the following error when running the optimizer in the Shaman model. Also attached is the character .xml that was open when this error occurred.
Also, just to make sure it wasn't just the shaman model, I had the same crash when opening up the warlock and priest model and running an optimize.
This is happening on my work computer (running Xp) and my home laptop (running Vista).
 
Wall of text incoming:
 
************** Exception Text **************
System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'Rawr.Buff' to type 'Rawr.ItemInstance'.
at Rawr.Optimizer.ItemInstanceOptimizer.<>c__DisplayClass2a.<BuildChildIndividual>b__29(Int32 slot, Object[] items)
at Rawr.Optimizer.OptimizerBase`3.GeneratorBuildIndividual(GeneratorItemSelector itemSelector)
at Rawr.Optimizer.ItemInstanceOptimizer.BuildChildIndividual(OptimizerCharacter father, OptimizerCharacter mother)
at Rawr.Optimizer.OptimizerBase`3.OptimizeGA(TIndividual injectIndividual, Single injectValue, Single& bestValue, TValuation& bestValuation, Boolean& injected)
at Rawr.Optimizer.OptimizerBase`3.Optimize(TIndividual injectIndividual, Single injectValue, Single& bestValue, TValuation& bestValuation, Boolean& injected)
at Rawr.Optimizer.OptimizerBase`3.Optimize(Single& bestValue)
at Rawr.Optimizer.ItemInstanceOptimizer.PrivateOptimizeCharacter(Character character, String calculationToOptimize, OptimizationRequirement[] requirements, Int32 thoroughness, Boolean injectCharacter, Boolean& injected, Exception& error)
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Unable to cast object of type 'Rawr.Buff' to type 'Rawr.ItemInstance'

Comments.Message:
Yeah, sorry... I need to make sure I have all issues selected when I search through instead of just open issues.  I feel kind of silly now...
Noticed it just after I posted the issue - and couldn't find a delete button.
